hey i got a quick question. I use nero to burn CDs but how do I burn .img's that need to be put on a DvD. Nero doesn't have the option. Is there a program that lets me do this? Please someone help me out.

Sorry Only The Movie No Subs And Extra :

Sorry Again But My Internet Connection Is Slow So Im Seeding So Mutch I Can

:)

Cpt. Planet

1. Download Deamon Tools (google it)
2. Mount the .img file and make a copy from the extra dvd drive you have in my computer

:) hope this will help

Cpt. Planet: In nero, choose burn image. You are asked to enter a filename, just type *.img and burn it. .img is the same as .iso.
If you don't trust nero, you can always choose to burn a .img-file with dvd-decrypter (google it) which supports .img natively
